metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29534 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Different techniques existed to obscure the fullscreen notification inFirefox and Focus for Android. These could have led to potential userconfusion and spoofing attacks. *This bug only affects Firefox and Focusfor Android. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.* This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox for Android < 112 and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
